wikipedia_page.main:
Charlie Felix Derrington Morgan (born 9 July 1989) is an English cricketer.  Morgan is a right-handed batsman who fields as a wicket-keeper.  He was born in Leicester, Leicestershire.
While studying for his degree at Durham University, Deuchar made his first-class debut for Durham UCCE against Lancashire in 2008.  He appeared in two further first-class matches for the university in 2009, against Lancashire and Durham.  Two more first-class appearances came in 2010 for the university, by now playing as Durham MCCU following a change of name, against Nottinghamshire and Durham.  In his five first-class matches, he scored 61 runs at an average of 10.16, with a high score of 38.  Behind the stumps, he took 5 catches and made a single stumping.
